message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to enhance your daily life. With its innovative features and superior quality, it's truly a game-changer. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $85. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing with your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $70.

Thank you for your interest, Bob! I understand your perspective and respect your valuation. To move forward, I'd like to suggest a counteroffer of $75 for the product. This price still allows me to cover my costs while offering you a competitive deal. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my research and considering the market value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $65 for the product.

I appreciate your diligence in evaluating the product, Bob. Considering the ongoing dialogue, I'd like to extend a counteroffer at $70 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that maintains a fair value for both parties while moving closer to your proposed price. I hope this suggestion is more amenable to your expectations.
